content.en: AKI prediction: Researchers have been using algorithms to address various research questions related to acute kidney injury. These algorithms are designed to assist in the management and prediction of outcomes for patients with acute kidney injury. They utilize different approaches, such as regular assessment of patient's condition, multivariable logistic regression models, biomarker and clinical risk scores, and standardized clinical assessment and management plans. By incorporating these algorithms into their studies, researchers aim to improve the identification, management, and prediction of acute kidney injury, ultimately leading to better patient outcomes.
content.da: AKI-forudsigelse: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til akut nyreskade. Disse algoritmer er designet til at hjælpe med håndtering og forudsigelse af resultater for patienter med akut nyreskade. De anvender forskellige tilgange, såsom regelmæssig vurdering af patientens tilstand, multivariable logistiske regressionsmodeller, biomarkører og kliniske risikoscore samt standardiserede kliniske vurderings- og håndteringsplaner. Ved at inkorporere disse algoritmer i deres studier sigter forskerne mod at forbedre identifikation, håndtering og forudsigelse af akut nyreskade, hvilket i sidste ende fører til bedre patientresultater.
